description:
Super hydrating and replumping sheet mask enriched with Hyaluronic Acid Pomegranate for dehydrated skin

Fine lines and dehydration making your skin look dull Ready set plump Mask up with our Super Hydrating Replumping Sheet Mask to supercharge your skin with a bomb of hydration in just 15 minutes Infused with the quantity of one bottle of serum and enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Pomegranate for hydration and replumping action Applied to the face the sheet acts like a compress of hydration for your skin to deliver all its efficacy It is easy to apply and leaves you free to move around during the wait time This sheet mask is biodegradable by homecompost

Proven Efficacy
After just 15 minutes
Skin is intensely rehydrated
Skin seems smoother looks fresh
Skin complexion is more radiant
After 1 week
Fine lines are reduced
Skin looks replumped firmer
Skin looks revitalised younger
Consumer test 54 women After 3 applications per week Instrumental evaluation 24 women

All Garnier products are officially approved by Cruelty Free International
Since 1989 Garnier has been committed to a world without animal testing

the sheet mask is compostable in homecompost conditions only Otherwise it should be discarded in general household waste Based on the amount of a 28ml bottle of serum


Infused with the quantity of one bottle of serum Based on the amount of a 28ml bottle of serum

Enriched with Hyaluronic Acid and Pomegranate for hydration and replumping action

Biodegradable by homecompost The sheet mask is compostable in homecompost conditions only Otherwise it should be discarded in general household waste

Suitable for sensitive skin

Vegan formula no animal derived ingredients or byproducts
name: Garnier Hydra Bomb Tissue Face Mask Pomegranate Each
